00001 /*
00002  *  maven Programming Language
00003  *  Created by Elliot Chance <elliot@chancemedia.com>.
00004  */
00005 
00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00008 #include "strings.h"
00009 #include "errors.h"
00010 #include "objects.h"
00011 
00012 bool pushFunction(MavenCompiler* c, int namespaceID, int objectID, MavenFunction func) {
00013         // bare functions must be public and static
00014         if(namespaceID == 0 && objectID == 0) {
00015                 func.isPublic = true;
00016                 func.isStatic = true;
00017         }
00018         
00019         // if its in an abstract class its static
00020         if(c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->isAbstract &&
00021            func.name != "callMethodByName")
00022                 func.isStatic = true;
00023         
00024         if(func.name == "getClassVariables")
00025                 func.isStatic = false;
00026         
00027         // we will not allow a constructor to go into an abstract class
00028         if(c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->isAbstract &&
00029            func.returnType == "<constructor>") {
00030                 pushError(c, "You are not allowed to put a constructor into an abstract class");
00031                 return false;
00032         }
00033         
00034         // normally here I would simply use findFunctionID(c, ) to see if the function existed, however
00035         // because inherited methods can be overloaded on multiple depths we need to have a manual
00036         // look through
00037         for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->length(); ++i) {
00038                 if(c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->at(i).name == func.name &&
00039                    c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->at(i).getSignature() == func.getSignature()) {
00040                         if(c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->at(i).isInherited) {
00041                                 // inherited function have to update the return type
00042                                 c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->at(i).returnType =
00043                                         findMavenObjectPath(c, func.returnType);
00044                         } else {
00045                                 pushError(c, "Method %s already defined (previously defined at line %s)",
00046                                                   c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->at(i).name +
00047                                                   "(" + c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->at(i).getSignature() + ")",
00048                                                   intToString(c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->at(i).atLine));
00049                                 return false;
00050                         }
00051                 }
00052         }
00053         
00054         /*int functionID = findFunctionID(c, namespaceID, objectID, func.name, func.args, true);
00055         if(functionID >= 0) {
00056                 // we are allowed to override inherited methods
00057                 if(!namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions[functionID].isInherited) {
00058                         
00059                 }
00060         }*/
00061         
00062         // functions are also not allowed to have the same name as a variable (includes inherited)
00063         for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->variables->length(); ++i) {
00064                 if(c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->variables->at(i).name == func.name) {
00065                         pushError(c, "You can not define the function %s(%s) with the same name as a variable member", func.name, func.getSignature());
00066                         return MAVEN_INVALID;
00067                 }
00068         }
00069         
00070         // push function
00071         c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->push(func);
00072         return true;
00073 }
